com.xatkit.plugins.telegram

Interface TelegramUtils

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.xatkit.plugins.chat.ChatUtils

    public interface TelegramUtils
extends com.xatkit.plugins.chat.ChatUtils
    An utility interface that holds Telegram-related helpers.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEFAULT_IGNORE_FALLBACK_ON_GROUP_CHANNELS
      The default value of the IGNORE_FALLBACK_ON_GROUP_CHANNELS_KEY Configuration key.
      static java.lang.String IGNORE_FALLBACK_ON_GROUP_CHANNELS_KEY
      The Configuration key to store whether to ignore fallback intents on group channels.
      static java.lang.String TELEGRAM_BOT_NAME
      The Configuration key to store the Telegram bot name displayed in contact details and elsewhere.
      static java.lang.String TELEGRAM_BOT_USERNAME
      The Configuration key to store the Telegram bot username identifying the bot.
      static java.lang.String TELEGRAM_TOKEN_KEY
      The Configuration key to store the Telegram bot token needed to interact with the API.

      • IGNORE_FALLBACK_ON_GROUP_CHANNELS_KEY

        static final java.lang.String IGNORE_FALLBACK_ON_GROUP_CHANNELS_KEY
        The Configuration key to store whether to ignore fallback intents on group channels.

        This value is set to false by default.

        See Also:
        DEFAULT_IGNORE_FALLBACK_ON_GROUP_CHANNELS, Constant Field Values
